document_data.mainbody:
orik was a merchant traveling along the High Road between Neverwinter and Luskan during the late 15 century DR. 
Rorik was stocky, with light brown hair and beard. He invoked Waukeens favor, being a merchant.
Some time around , Rorik joined the merchants caravan of Tollin and his crew going from Neverwinter to Luskan, accompanied by members of the Order of the Burning Dawn. However several members of the caravans group and missing and the caravan was later attacked by mercenaries, an assault that was set up by the treacherous Martumal.
